title: So The Reds Aren't Going To Give the Community Feedback On the Sona Nerfs?
body:
So the reds can comment on Veigar's Laugh and Free skins but what about all these posts about the Sona and Janna nerfs coming to a rift near you? Ya'll afraid? What about the Taric VU? Ya'll can update everything else in the game but leave Taric high and dry?




I'm calling you out Reds. Big girl/boy pants.

replies.body:
We actually just did [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3NL0vjdZ-the-pbe-has-been-down-for-2-and-a-half-weeks-first-update-is-a-nerf-to-sona?comment=00110002)! 

Winter break meant a brief pause in comments on the boards from us! Sorry about that!

Sorry but the question still is, why is Sona getting nerfed?
That comment didn't show any light onto the reasons why she requires a nerf, we still have NO IDEA why she is getting them other then "Cus our tools say so"

Why do those tools say so?
How is it that Sona is a bigger priority then a massive slew of other problematic champions?

I really admire Jag. It takes guts to say absolutely nothing and still consider you made a response to the community.

Morello and his vision on supports back in the first two seasons did not leave you (Riot as a whole) in a good position with the support mains community, specially regarding Sona and Soraka. I'd love to see you someday aknowledge this situation and actually providing a meaningful response to these cases.

KateyKhaos is more just relaying the information (she works on the skins team), I would, if you haven't already, direct your questions over to the threads she's linked; you'll have a better shot at getting a good answer that way :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=gUiyr3ri,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-06T23:51:51.146+0000)
>
> We actually just did [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/3NL0vjdZ-the-pbe-has-been-down-for-2-and-a-half-weeks-first-update-is-a-nerf-to-sona?comment=00110002)! 
> 
> Winter break meant a brief pause in comments on the boards from us! Sorry about that!

But now where in that was it explained WHY she was nerfed. Just "trust us we know what we are doing and totally have the numbers to prove it, no you can't see them!"

I just don't understand how you can justify nerfing her at all, how is her gameplay toxic? We have Blitz and Thresh grabs, Nami with her Q knock up stun, Jana with her team fight disrupting ult, alistar with his headbut/infinite sustain and yet somehow Sona is the most broken support. Not saying all the champions I mentioned need a nerf but they simply offer more to the support position than Sona.

Ppl will just throw her away because she is weak and it would be much better to take nami over sona especially that Knockups aren't cut by tenacity where sona ults is (at least give her galio treatment). 

I see Thresh every game and his last nerf was a joke. Is there any rational explanation why THresh is balanced and Sona isn't?
